title: Musk Thinks Tesla Robot Could Eclipse Car Business
itunes:title: Musk Thinks Tesla Robot Could Eclipse Car Business
description:
Rupali Limaye, Director of Behavioral and Implementation Science at the International Vaccine Access Center based at the Johns Hopkins Bloomberg School of Public Health, talks about the fight against growing antimicrobial resistance, or infections that don’t respond to drugs. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg News Technology Reporter Austin Carr share the details of Austin's Businessweek Magazine story McCormick Sees Growth in Push for Total Hot Sauce Supremacy. Bloomberg News Technology Reporter Dana Hull discusses Tesla CEO Elon Musk saying a humanoid robot may be the most important product the carmaker is working on. And we Drive to the Close with Hilary Kramer, President and CIO at A&G Capital.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
